_settings.show_empty_days_description: when disabled, days with nothing scheduled will be hidden from other users
_settings.empty_day_text_description: this text will display on days with no scheduled events
_settings.show_past_events_description: display events that have already occurred in the past
_settings.use_24_hour_time_description: display times in 24-hour format (e.g., 14:00) instead of 12-hour (e.g., 2:00 PM)
_settings.show_social_links_description: display social media links on your schedule page
_settings.first_day_of_week_description: choose which day appears first in your weekly schedule
_settings.show_logo_description: display the application logo on your schedule
